dundee.dominant_trees: 100+ year-old Bur Oaks, Sycamores, and Silver Maples
dundee.common_issues: crown stabilization for aging giants and clearance pruning for overhead power lines
dundee.local_risk: Many large limbs overhang historic slate roofs and narrow driveways, requiring rigging experts, not just 'guys with ropes'.
dundee.meta_snippet: Specializing in historic Bur Oak preservation and tight-quarter rigging.

benson.dominant_trees: Silver Maples, Hackberries, and aging Elms
benson.common_issues: storm damage cleanup from brittle Silver Maples and alleyway clearance for utilities
benson.local_risk: Most tree removals here require navigating tight alleys and detached garages.
benson.meta_snippet: Expert alleyway removals and storm cleanup for brittle Silver Maples.

millard.dominant_trees: Pin Oaks, Green Ash, and Linden trees
millard.common_issues: Iron Chlorosis (yellowing leaves) in Pin Oaks and Emerald Ash Borer treatments
millard.local_risk: Sidewalk heaving from surface roots is a major code violation issue in these subdivisions.
millard.meta_snippet: Treating Pin Oak chlorosis and hazardous Ash tree removals.

westside.common_issues: deadwooding to prevent limb drop on manicured lawns
westside.local_risk: These large lots often have 'widow maker' limbs high in the canopy that go unnoticed.
westside.meta_snippet: High-canopy deadwooding and aesthetic pruning for estate properties.

tiburon.common_issues: structural splitting of ornamental Pear trees during high winds
tiburon.local_risk: Heavy clay soil compaction often suffocates young maples, requiring air-spading or deep root fertilization.
tiburon.meta_snippet: Preventing Pear tree splitting and correcting clay soil compaction.

the-ridges.dominant_trees: Blue Spruce, White Pine, and ornamental screens
the-ridges.common_issues: needle cast disease in Spruce trees and shaping privacy hedges
the-ridges.local_risk: Bagworms can decimate a privacy screen in weeks if not caught early.
the-ridges.meta_snippet: Disease management for Blue Spruce and privacy screen maintenance.

florence.dominant_trees: Ancient Black Walnuts and massive Cottonwoods
florence.common_issues: stabilizing trees on steep Loess soil slopes to prevent erosion
florence.local_risk: The steep terrain here makes standard bucket truck access impossible; we rely on climbing gear and specialized rigging.
florence.meta_snippet: Steep-slope tree removal and Black Walnut care in historic Florence.

midtown.dominant_trees: Sycamores, Lindens, and Gingko street trees
midtown.common_issues: clearance pruning for street parking visibility and historic setbacks
midtown.local_risk: Root compaction from high foot traffic and street construction often stresses these urban trees.
midtown.meta_snippet: Urban forestry and street clearance for Midtown's historic avenues.

aksarben.dominant_trees: Mature Elm hybrids and newly planted Red Maples
aksarben.common_issues: correcting 'volcano mulching' on newer commercial plantings
aksarben.local_risk: Storm damage here often blocks critical alleyway access for power crews.
aksarben.meta_snippet: Commercial tree care and storm prep for the Aksarben corridor.

north-omaha.common_issues: removing 'volunteer' Tree of Heaven (invasive) clusters along fencelines
north-omaha.local_risk: Many older Siberian Elms are nearing end-of-life and drop heavy limbs without warning.
north-omaha.meta_snippet: Invasive species removal and hazardous Elm mitigation.

south-omaha.common_issues: line-clearance pruning in tight residential grids
south-omaha.local_risk: Backyard access is the #1 challenge here; our narrow-access lifts are essential.
south-omaha.meta_snippet: Tight-access tree removal for South Omaha's dense neighborhoods.

old-millard.dominant_trees: large Silver Maples and River Birches
old-millard.common_issues: surface root pruning where trees have overgrown sidewalks
old-millard.local_risk: River Birches planted too close to foundations often cause basement moisture issues here.
old-millard.meta_snippet: Foundation clearance and surface root management in Old Millard.

harvey-oaks.dominant_trees: Pin Oaks and Sunburst Honey Locusts
harvey-oaks.common_issues: treating severe Iron Chlorosis (yellow leaves) in Pin Oaks
harvey-oaks.local_risk: Honey Locusts here are prone to Canker disease, which weakens major limbs silently.
harvey-oaks.meta_snippet: Specialized Iron treatments for Harvey Oaks' suffering Pin Oaks.

oak-hills.common_issues: aesthetic pruning to maintain fairway views without killing the tree
oak-hills.local_risk: Golf ball damage to bark can actually introduce fungal pathogens in younger trees.
oak-hills.meta_snippet: View-enhancing pruning for golf course properties.

millard-highlands.common_issues: emergency storm cleanup for brittle softwood trees
millard-highlands.local_risk: Many trees here were planted directly under power drops in the 1970s.
millard-highlands.meta_snippet: Power-line safety clearance and Ash tree removal.

pacific-springs.dominant_trees: Autumn Blaze Maples and ornamental Pears
pacific-springs.common_issues: correcting poor structure from 'topped' trees in previous years
pacific-springs.local_risk: Fast-growing maples here often have weak branch unions that split in ice storms.
pacific-springs.meta_snippet: Corrective pruning for fast-growing estate maples.

skyline-ranches.common_issues: Pine Wilt disease identification and removal
skyline-ranches.local_risk: Windbreaks that aren't thinned become fire hazards and lose their bottom branches.
skyline-ranches.meta_snippet: Acreage windbreak management and Pine Wilt removal.

indian-creek.local_risk: Beetles skeletonize leaves here in July; preventative treatment is mandatory.
indian-creek.meta_snippet: Japanese Beetle defense for Indian Creek's Linden trees.

aspen-creek.dominant_trees: Newly planted Red Oaks and Maples
aspen-creek.common_issues: removing girdling roots caused by nursery containers
aspen-creek.local_risk: Construction soil compaction is killing young trees here before they establish.
aspen-creek.meta_snippet: Post-construction soil aeration and young tree establishment.

buffalo-creek.dominant_trees: Native Cottonwoods mixed with new plantings
buffalo-creek.common_issues: cleaning up 'wild' fence rows to define property lines
buffalo-creek.local_risk: Retaining native Cottonwoods near new houses requires safety cabling.
buffalo-creek.meta_snippet: Acreage property line clearing and native tree safety.

mockingbird-hills.common_issues: Fire blight treatment in fruit trees
mockingbird-hills.local_risk: Siberian Elms drop branches constantly; we recommend proactive deadwooding here.
mockingbird-hills.meta_snippet: Fruit tree disease management and Elm maintenance.

shadow-lake.common_issues: structural pruning for wind resistance near the open water
shadow-lake.local_risk: High water tables can actually cause shallow rooting, making trees prone to tipping.

eagle-hills.common_issues: identifying late-stage EAB (Emerald Ash Borer) infestation
eagle-hills.local_risk: Brittle, dead Ash trees near driveways are a liability crisis in this area.

fontenelle-hills.common_issues: Oak Wilt prevention and forest floor management
fontenelle-hills.local_risk: These are forest trees living in yards; they resent grade changes and construction damage.
fontenelle-hills.meta_snippet: Old-growth Oak preservation in the Bellevue forest.

newport-landing.dominant_trees: Weeping Willows and river bottom species
newport-landing.common_issues: cleaning up storm debris that blows off the lake
newport-landing.local_risk: Willows are messy and brittle; we position them away from boat docks/lifts.
newport-landing.meta_snippet: Lakefront storm cleanup and Willow tree management.
